DESCRIPTION: #yMatures in #b3 turns. NL #yGrow: Gain #b2 #yVigor. NL #yHarvest: Gain #b3 temporary #yStrength.
#yMatures in #b3 turns. NL #yHarvest: Deal #b8 damage to ALL enemies.

#yMatures in #b3 turns. NL #yGrow: Deal #b2 damage to ALL enemies. NL #yHarvest: Deal #b4 damage to ALL enemies.
#yMatures in #b3 turns. NL #yGrow: Gain #b1 #yThorns. NL #yHarvest: Lose all #yThorns.
